name: Easy Caramelized Onion Pork Chops
author: Pamela Newland
summary: Caramelized onions give the flavor to these easy to make pork chops - yummy!  Great with parsley potatoes!
ingredients: 4 (4 ounce) pork loin chops, 1/2 inch thick
directions: Rub chops with 2 teaspoons seasoning salt and 1 teaspoon pepper, or to taste
In a skillet, heat oil over medium heat
Brown pork chops on each side
Add the onions and water to the pan
Cover, reduce heat, and simmer for 20 minutes
Turn chops over, and add remaining salt and pepper
Cover, and cook until water evaporates and onions turn light to medium brown
Remove chops from pan, and serve with onions on top
